helperbird.question: What is Helperbird?
helperbird.answer: With a delightfully intuitive and easy-to-use design, Helperbird is your all-in-one extension that provides personalized support to make web pages, PDFs, and documents more accessible and productive to your needs. It is designed to help everyone with the web in a way that suits their abilities learning styles and lifestyle.

helperbird.question: Do you offer discounts?
helperbird.answer: Yes. When you pay for a year upfront, you will get two months free. We also offer discounts for students.

helperbird.question: How do I login
helperbird.answer: We use the email your logged into Google Chrome or your browser. Suppose you need to update your email. Just contact us.

helperbird.question: Do you accept purchase orders?
helperbird.answer: Yes, we do. You can either contact support or visit our purchase orders page.

helperbird.question: Do I need a student email for the student pricing?
helperbird.answer: Yes, we are doing the honour system here. We will follow up to ask for confirmation you are a student.

helperbird.question: Is Helperbird Free?
helperbird.answer: Yes. We give you the basic features for free. Those features will always be free. We have a Pro version, which helps support the development of Helperbird and the costs with the Pro features. We keep our prices as low as possible, which lower than others. If you have any questions I would love to answer them.

helperbird.question: Can we cancel at any time?
helperbird.answer: There's no minimum contract for Helperbird â€” cancel at any time without penalty or hassle.. To cancel, open up the app, go to the subscription option, and click cancel.

helperbird.question: Why are we charging for this?
helperbird.answer: The $6.99 per month is to support the cost of the development of new and upcoming features. We also do a yearly subscription for $60.00 as this is a one-person team.

helperbird.question: What browsers does Helperbird run on?
helperbird.answer: Currently Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox and Edge. Coming soon on macOS Safari extension and iPad.

helperbird.question: I have a suggestion!
helperbird.answer: Excellent I would love to hear about it! Email robert.gabriel@helperbird.com with your suggestion.

helperbird.question: Does Helperbird and OpenDyslexic work on Google Docs?
helperbird.answer: Yes! Google Docs currently doesn't support some fonts like OpenDyslexic. So we built CSS and support for these fonts.

helperbird.question: What if I have more questions?
helperbird.answer: We'd be happy to answer them.
